actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require an appropriate warning on the label of any potentially dangerous drug, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires an appropriate warning on the label of any potentially dangerous drug, as determined by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare. Provides for the labelling of trade names under specified circumstances. Permits the Secretary to approve upon application an official name for a new drug.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require an appropriate warning on the label of any potentially dangerous drug, and for other purposes.
